item.title: Compiler and java problem
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

@echo off @TITLE Complier if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler and java problem
item.dc:creator: @vincentpet6 vincentpet6
item.description:
@vincentpet6 wrote:

ok heres the problem I download JDK update 6 16 and I can’t compile. Compiler:@echo off
Title Compiler
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;*.java
pause .

Variables:CLASSPATH:CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
:classpath:CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
:PATH:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin; :pathC:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;
I don’t know whats wrong is it my compiler my variables what can it be??
Please help me :([color=red][/color]
